ShareSave
Joining ShareSave
Can I join both three- and five-year plans?

Can I join both three and five-year plans?

Yes, so long as you stay within the overall 300 PLN per month limit for ShareSave 2023.

Don’t forget you can join every year and have up to five years’ plans running at once, with up to 300 PLN a month going into each year’s plan.
